{"id":836876250,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1667582420,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1862 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/836876250/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"729.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String reverseVowels(String s) {\n    \n          char[] arr=s.toCharArray(); // ye string ko character ke array me kar dega\n        \n          int left=0;\n          int right=arr.length-1;\n        \n        while(left<right)\n        {\n            while(left<right&&isVowel(arr,left)==false)\n            {\n                left++;\n            }\n            \n            while(left<right&&isVowel(arr,right)==false)\n            {\n                right--;\n            }\n            \n            swap(arr,left,right);\n            left++;\n            right--;\n        }\n          // converting charArray to string\n        String str=\"\";\n        for(char ch:arr)\n        {\n            str+=ch;\n        }\n        return str;\n            \n    }\n    public boolean isVowel(char[] arr,int idx)\n    {\n        if(arr[idx]=='a'||arr[idx]=='e'||arr[idx]=='i'||arr[idx]=='o'||arr[idx]=='u'||arr[idx]=='A'||arr[idx]=='E'||arr[idx]=='I'||arr[idx]=='O'||arr[idx]=='U')\n        {\n            return true;\n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n    public void swap(char[] arr,int left,int right)\n    {\n        char temp=arr[left];\n        arr[left]=arr[right];\n        arr[right]=temp;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string","has_notes":false}
